overview: He is the champion. Not only of his sport. But for people. Now someone want's to destroy everything he has fought so hard to create. This evil comes in two forms, one human the other a walking nightmare. There is no turning back now. Hammerhead Jones is about to meet his destiny face-to-face inside an arena from which there is no escape.
tagline: They say it's fake. They say no one ever really get's hurt. But this time he's fighting for his life.
title: Hammerhead Jones
